content.text: Match ends, Recreativo 2, Xerez 0.
Second Half ends, Recreativo 2, Xerez 0.
Foul by Israel (Xerez).
Jonathan Valle (Recreativo) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Corner,  Xerez. Conceded by Manolo Martínez.
Attempt blocked. Redondo (Xerez) left footed shot from the left side of the six yard box is blocked. Assisted by Bruno Herrero.
Attempt missed. José Mari (Xerez) header from the centre of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Adri with a cross following a corner.
Corner,  Xerez. Conceded by Manolo Martínez.
Attempt missed. Ángel Montoro (Recreativo) right footed shot from more than 35 yards misses to the left. Assisted by Jonathan Valle.
Attempt saved. Ruz (Xerez) header from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Jesús Mendoza with a cross.
Jesús Mendoza (Xerez) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Dangerous play by Jesús Berrocal (Recreativo).
